posts.post_title: T206 Chief Bender portrait PSA 4 SC 350/25 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
CARD IS SOLD

Nice Bender portrait, just doesn't fit my collection any longer.
$OLD DLVD net to me

Last two comps are $x and $x, both this month, both Sweet Caps.  This back combo is the lowest of the Sweet Caps on the spec pop at PSA, 8 total - this is a pop 1 with 3 higher.

I might also consider trade, but only for other HOFers.

DM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url].

I'll take it trumps any ongoing negotiations.
